definition: activity that frees or expresses creative energy or emotion, expose to cool or cold air so as to cool or freshen
details:
noun
- activity that frees or expresses creative energy or emotion
= synonyms: release
- external opening of urinary or genital system of a lower vertebrate
- a hole for the escape of gas or air
= synonyms: venthole, vent-hole, blowhole
- a slit in a garment (as in the back seam of a jacket)
- a fissure in the earth's crust (or in the surface of some other planet) through which molten lava and gases erupt
verb
- expose to cool or cold air so as to cool or freshen
= synonyms: air
- give expression or utterance to
= example: give expression or utterance to
= synonyms: ventilate, give vent
